title: Source definition schema
description: The schema for a source definition. This is used to validate the source definition configuration files (db-config.json).

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for a source without any whitespace or special characters.
name.$comment: Typically, all the characters are in lowercase with words separated by underscores.

displayName.title: Display Name
displayName.description: A human-readable name for a source, typically, derived from the branding of the source.
displayName.$comment: This will be used in the front-end (web app), docs, etc. to identify a source.

options.title: Options
options.$comment: This hosts miscellaneous information about the source.

isBeta.title: Is Beta
isBeta.description: Whether the source is in beta.
isBeta.$comment: This is used to display a 'beta' badge in the UI.

anyOf.title: Hidden
anyOf.$comment: This is used to hide the source from the UI.

anyOf.title: Hidden
anyOf.$comment: This is used to hide the source from the UI.

featureFlagName.title: Feature Flag Name
featureFlagName.description: The feature flag name to control the visibility of the source.
featureFlagName.$comment: This is used to control the visibility of the source from the UI based on the feature flag.

featureFlagValue.title: Feature Flag Value
featureFlagValue.description: The default value of the feature flag.
featureFlagValue.$comment: This is used to toggle the visibility of the source from the UI based on the feature flag value. false indicates it is always hidden and feature flag should be enabled to show and vice-versa for true value.

sdkExecutionEnvironment.title: SDK Execution Environment
sdkExecutionEnvironment.description: It denotes the environment in which the SDK is executed. The presence of this field also indicates that the source is an SDK source.
